title: Ability to import from mtputty
author: wfeddern
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
I have a large number of ssh sessions defined in mtputty (including subfolders) that I would like to migrate to mRemoteNG. ( http://ttyplus.com/multi-tabbed-putty/ )

comments.author: sinicis
comments.snippet: would be super handy! any news about it?

comments.author: mrtiagorsouza
